actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the period from October 12 through 19 of each year as "National Patriotic Education Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the period from October 12 through 19 of each year as "National Patriotic Education Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the period from October 12 through 19 of each year as "National Patriotic Education Week".
